Irene Kalinowski, Auckland midwife who refused Covid-19 vaccine, sentenced for continued work https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/irene-kalinowski-auckland-midwife-who-refused-covid-19-vaccine-sentenced-for-continued-work/JTWLG4URJZCATBLL7DREKJEKPI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/crime/irene-kalinowski-auckland-midwife-who-refused-covid-19-vaccine-sentenced-for-continued-work/JTWLG4URJZCATBLL7DREKJEKPI/ Craig Kapitan'See you at the military tribunals,' said Irene Kalinowski as she left court.
